waive.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to state officially that a right, rule etc can be ignored
waive.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: She waived her right to a lawyer.
waive.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to state officially that a right, rule etc can be ignored in a particular case
waive.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: The government has waived restrictions on dealing in foreign currencies.
American Express offered to waive fees for additional cards held by family members.
